title: News | Global Health Care Services | Houston Methodist
description: Get the latest Houston Methodist news and information for our international patients, from tips to getting and staying healthy to our latest medical research.
text:
News
Stay Connected
Stay connected with Houston Methodist year round. By signing up, you will receive our e-newsletter with articles, videos, health tips and more.
[Subscribe](https://www.houstonmethodist.org/global/form-pages/global-health-stay-connected/)
The physicians and scientists at Houston Methodist are constantly pushing the boundaries of medicine to bring innovative advancements to our patients. Learn more about the latest news and information relevant to our international patients from the articles listed below.
July 2023
June 2023
May 2023
